xsl:template.name: InlineScript

stats.name: time
stats.string: Sum of component times may exceed total in multi-threaded renders.

timer.name: temporalVolumeBufferTimer
timer.description: Time to create motion data for temporal volume

float.name: cameraDetailDilation
float.description: Geometry detail expansion from multiple cameras

memory.name: proceduralMemory
memory.description: Ray traced procedurals and subdivs (counted against proceduralmemory limit)

int.name: gutRadiosityShaded
int.description: Surface shaded points during opacity caching

stats.name: brickmaps
stats.description: Brick map and brick cache stats

memory.name: brickCacheActualMem
memory.description: Actual memory used by brick caches

int.name: nMaterialAreaHits
int.description: Num material sample hits on area lights

int.name: nMaterialEnvHits
int.description: Num material sample hits on env lights

timer.name: lightingInternalTime
timer.description: Total time in lighting services excluding subordinate systems

timer.name: lightingLookupTime
timer.description: Total time looking up lighting configurations

timer.name: lightingMaterialShadowTime
timer.description: Time in material sample evaluation - shadowing

timer.name: lightingMaterialTraceTime
timer.description: Time in material sample evaluation - trace

timer.name: lightingMaterialTimeExcluding
timer.description: Time in material sample evaluation excluding subordinate systems

timer.name: lightingLightSamplepickTime
timer.description: Time in light sample generation - pick and sort

timer.name: lightingLightShadowTime
timer.description: Time in light sample generation - shadowing

timer.name: lightingLightEvalTime
timer.description: Time in light sample generation - Bxdf evaluation

timer.name: lightingLightSampleTimeExcluding
timer.description: Time in light sample generation exlcuding subordinate systems

timer.name: lightingPhotonSamplepickTime
timer.description: Time in photon generation - pick and sort

timer.name: lightingPhotonTraceBxdfTime
timer.description: Time in photon generation - trace and Bxdf evaluation at hits

timer.name: lightingPhotonSampleTimeExcluding
timer.description: Time in photon generation excluding subordinate systems

memory.name: estimatorLightingMem
memory.description: Memory consumed by lighting services for estimators

int.name: NumAutomataBuilds
int.description: Number of times automata was built

int.name: NFA States
int.description: Number of input NFA states built directly from LPEs

int.name: DFA States
int.description: Number of output DFA states built from the NFA

int.name: Alphabet Size
int.description: Size of alphabet used by the output DFA

stats.description: Automata with support for only single-lobe

int.name: NFA States
int.description: Number of input NFA states built directly from LPEs

int.name: DFA States
int.description: Number of output DFA states built from the NFA

int.name: Alphabet Size
int.description: Size of alphabet used by the output DFA

stats.name: RISNodes
stats.description: characteristics of your scene's use of RIS nodes

stats.description: Time and memory associated with RiBxdf
